pinyin: Xiang1 hu4 Bao3 zheng4 Hui3 mie4

definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]
to destroy/to damage/to ruin/to defame/to slander
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown
